channel.title: personal on Yaya's World
channel.description: Recent content in personal on Yaya's World

item.title: Needing Support is Not Being Lazy
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: This is going to be a bit of a rant. If that is not why you're here and not the type of content you want to see from me, I fully understand. Please feel free to skip this article, even if it is still the only update this week. Before you do that though, I'll let you know a little about what happened and why this is, yet again, the only thing updated this week.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Am Not Lazy Am Busy
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: I am committed to making sure there is something new on this site every week even if there isn't much! There will probably be some things coming up next week, but this week was quite a bit busier than it appeared on screen, particularly today. I still have a few things to finish, but at least work is over ðŸ˜… Only a News Article? Yes, I have to apologize, I had a lot to do this week for work and school and those are all just a bit more important than this site.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Ready for the New Year
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: I hope you all are looking forward to Christmas! If not, well maybe I can give you all something to look forward too! This year's Christmas illustration is finished and it features Nagisa. It will be your first opportunity to see what she looks like, so I hope that's enough to get you to look forward to Christmas. I mean, I could release her now, but I'm going to wait just so you all have a Christmas present to look forward to.
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Actually on Track
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: For the past several months, I have fell behind on a lot of things. My school work was usually just barely on time, and work from my primary job was always submitted right on the deadline, but my commissions were always just a bit later than I'd like and many of my personal projects, including my playthrough of Persona 4 Golden, were all far behind. This week things changed and now I am not only caught up on everything but I'm ahead!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: More time!
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: Some changes are coming and those changes may leave me with more time to do fun things!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi

item.title: Covid Visit!
item.author: yayoi_chi@icloud.com (Shizumi Yayoi)
item.description: COVID-19 has come around and now I have a lot of time!
item.dc:creator: Shizumi Yayoi
